name: Dominica
startIntroPart1: the Dominicans must prosper, and they look to you to lead them to greatness.
startIntroPart2: Your people are ready to carry out your orders. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Apres Bondie, C'est La Ter. Surrender, or face our wrath!
attacked: Tall is her body, and heavy is her hit.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
